name: WhatsApp
description:
Connect your organization with the official OnBuddy WhatsApp chatbot.

To use the OnBuddy WhatsApp chatbot:
 1. Go to Settings and ensure your phone number is saved.
 2. Add this number as a contact on WhatsApp: +31 6 84759771 
You can now begin chatting with the OnBuddy WhatsApp chatbot. To change your current organization, switch your organization on the OnBuddy web app.
